items.name: Lin O.
items.text: Everything turned out the way I envisioned it. Very nice job.

items.name: Andrea T.
items.text: M&E took down a non‑load bearing wall between the dining room and the living room giving us an open space living. We are very happy with their work. The guys came every day until the work is complete. They also cleaned up at the end and haul all the construction debris away. Marc and his team did a great job giving us a new living space that we love and enjoy everyday.

items.name: Christine N.
items.text: I recently had a concrete driveway project done by M&E Construction.. the process was smooth.. I'm so happy with how everything turned out!

items.name: Ilya K.
items.text: Marc and his team at M&E Construction and Renovation were incredibly professional and reliable. They completed two complete bathroom remodels in a timely and efficient manner. They were extremely communicative, friendly, and honest throughout the entire process — overall a very smooth experience and both bathrooms turned out fantastic! Would highly recommend Marc and his excellent team and would gladly work with them again!

items.name: Michelle K.
items.text: Marc's team was extremely professional and diligent in getting the job done.

faq.sectionSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our bathroom, kitchen, and basement renovation services, including design options, maintenance, and guarantees.

faqs.question: How long does the renovation take?
faqs.answer: Project timelines vary depending on the size and complexity of your renovation. Bathroom remodels are typically completed within a few days, kitchen renovations may take one to two weeks, and full basement finishing can take several weeks. We provide a detailed schedule before work begins so you know exactly what to expect.

faqs.question: Do you remove my existing fixtures or appliances?
faqs.answer: Yes, our team handles the demolition and removal process safely and efficiently. We prepare the area for new installations while minimizing mess and disruption to your home.

faqs.question: What kind of guarantee do you provide?
faqs.answer: All of our projects come with a workmanship guarantee. We stand behind the quality of our materials and craftsmanship, ensuring every renovation meets professional standards and your satisfaction.

faqs.question: Can I customize the design and materials?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We offer a wide range of design options, materials, colors, and finishes to match your style and budget. Our team works closely with you to create a custom layout for your bathroom, kitchen, or basement.

faqs.question: How do I maintain my new bathroom, kitchen, or basement?
faqs.answer: Our renovations are designed for long-term durability and easy maintenance. Regular cleaning with non-abrasive products will keep surfaces looking fresh. We also provide care instructions specific to your chosen materials.

faqs.question: Do you offer eco-friendly options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use sustainable materials and environmentally friendly processes wherever possible, for bathrooms, kitchens, and basements.

faqs.question: Can you upgrade existing plumbing and electrical systems?
faqs.answer: Our team can assess and upgrade plumbing, electrical, and HVAC systems as part of your renovation to ensure safety, efficiency, and compliance with local codes.

faqs.question: Are your materials durable and mold-resistant?
faqs.answer: We use high-quality, durable materials for all projects. Surfaces are designed to resist mold, mildew, and everyday wear, ensuring longevity and safety.

faqs.question: Do you provide a project estimate before starting?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide detailed, transparent estimates for every project. You’ll know costs, materials, and timelines upfront before any work begins.

faqs.question: Can I renovate multiple areas at once?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can coordinate bathroom, kitchen, and basement renovations simultaneously or in phases to fit your schedule and minimize disruption.

hero.headline: Our Story
hero.title: Building Trust Since 2022
hero.description: Established in 2022, M&E Construction & Renovations has quickly become a trusted name in residential and commercial remodeling, delivering exceptional craftsmanship and innovative solutions that transform homes and businesses.

mission.sectionSubtitle: At M&E Construction & Renovation, what matters most to us is transforming your home into a space that brings joy, functionality, and value. We're passionate about maximizing the potential of every area, whether it's turning a basement into an entertainer's dream, creating a spa-like bathroom retreat, or designing a stunning, functional kitchen.
mission.title: Crafting Homes with Heart and Purpose
mission.description: We pride ourselves on delivering excellence, combining style and practicality in every project. Trust and care are at the core of everything we do because we understand your home is your sanctuary. From concrete patios to walkways, we focus on enhancing both the aesthetic and usability of your spaces, helping you fall in love with your home all over again.

foundation.sectionSubtitle: Since 2022, we've been committed to transforming residential and commercial spaces with exceptional craftsmanship and innovative design solutions that exceed expectations.

features: A Beautiful New Look Without the Mess

features.sectionSubtitle: Discover the benefits of our modern bathroom renovation solutions designed for style, durability, and convenience.

features.title: No Demolition Required
features.description: Our innovative process installs directly over your existing fixtures, saving time, cost, and avoiding the mess of traditional renovations.

features.title: Durable & Easy to Clean
features.description: High-quality acrylic surfaces are resistant to stains, mildew, and discoloration, making maintenance effortless.

features.title: Custom Designs
features.description: We offer a variety of styles, colors, and layouts to create a bathroom that reflects your taste and fits your space perfectly.

beforeAfter.sectionSubtitle: Explore inspiring transformations and see how M&E Construction & Renovations can revitalize your bathroom with smart, efficient solutions.
descriptions: At M&E Construction & Renovations, we specialize in transforming bathrooms with smart, efficient solutions that avoid the mess and cost of traditional remodeling. Our innovative process works directly over your existing fixtures, allowing for a smooth, hassle-free renovation that delivers stunning results.

From outdated tubs to worn surfaces, our team can revitalize your bathroom with a fresh, modern design tailored to your lifestyle and taste. Choose from a wide range of materials, colors, and finishes to create a bathroom that feels both elegant and functional.

Whether you're looking for a subtle refresh or a complete remodel, M&E provides expert guidance and tailored solutions every step of the way. Explore our bathtub ideas, get inspired by real transformations, and see how we can turn your bathroom into a beautiful, practical space you'll love for years to come.

customization.description: With hundreds of combinations to choose from, creating a bathroom that balances style, functionality, and durability has never been easier. Explore our options, mix and match elements, and bring your vision to life with a space you'll love for years to come.

process.sectionSubtitle: One Team from Start to Finish
process.description: At M&E Construction & Renovations, we make remodeling your bathroom seamless and enjoyable. From your first consultation to the final finishing touches, our team guides you through each step with care, expertise, and attention to detail. During your free in-home consultation, one of our experts helps you explore a wide range of styles, colors, and finishes to design your ideal bath or shower. Once your selections are made, our proven three-step process ensures precision, quality, and a beautiful result every time.

steps.title: MAKE
steps.description: Your new tub, walls and accessories are made to measure in our state-of-the-art manufacturing facility.

steps.title: PREPARE
steps.description: Existing surfaces are cleaned and repaired before installation.

steps.title: INSTALL
steps.description: No stress or mess - installation is complete in a single day.

faq.sectionSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our bathroom remodeling services, including design options, timelines, materials, and maintenance.

faqs.question: How long does a bathroom remodel take?
faqs.answer: Most bathroom remodels are completed within one to two weeks, depending on the size, design complexity, and material availability. We’ll provide a clear project timeline before starting so you know exactly what to expect.

faqs.question: Do you handle the demolition and removal process?
faqs.answer: Yes, our team takes care of removing old fixtures, tiles, and materials safely and efficiently. We ensure proper disposal and prepare your bathroom for the new installation with minimal mess or disruption.

faqs.question: What type of warranty or guarantee do you offer?
faqs.answer: All bathroom remodels come with a workmanship guarantee. We stand behind our quality and ensure every project meets professional standards and your complete satisfaction.

faqs.question: Can I customize the design and layout?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can choose from a variety of layouts, tiles, vanities, fixtures, lighting options, and finishes. Our design team will help you create a bathroom that fits your style, space, and budget.

faqs.question: How should I maintain my new bathroom?
faqs.answer: Your new bathroom is designed for easy maintenance. Regular cleaning with mild, non-abrasive products will keep surfaces fresh and looking new. We’ll also provide material-specific care instructions after installation.

faqs.question: Do you offer eco-friendly bathroom options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer sustainable materials, water-saving fixtures, and energy-efficient lighting options to create an eco-conscious bathroom remodel.

faqs.question: Can you upgrade plumbing and electrical systems?
faqs.answer: Yes, our licensed professionals can update your bathroom’s plumbing, electrical, and ventilation systems to meet modern safety standards and improve performance.

faqs.question: Are your materials water- and mold-resistant?
faqs.answer: We use premium, moisture-resistant materials designed to prevent mold, mildew, and water damage, ensuring long-lasting durability and a healthier bathroom environment.

faqs.question: Will I receive a detailed estimate before work begins?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide a transparent, itemized estimate before starting. You’ll know exactly what’s included, including materials, labor, and project timelines.

faqs.question: Can you remodel multiple bathrooms at the same time?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can remodel several bathrooms simultaneously or in phases to fit your schedule and minimize inconvenience during the renovation process.

faq.sectionSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our shower remodeling services, including installation, customization, materials, and maintenance.

faqs.question: How long does a shower installation take?
faqs.answer: Most shower installations are completed in as little as one to two days, depending on the scope of work. Since our process doesn’t require full demolition, you can enjoy your new shower with minimal disruption.

faqs.question: Do you remove my old shower or bathtub?
faqs.answer: Yes, our team safely removes your existing shower, tub, or fixtures as part of the installation process. We handle all preparation and cleanup to ensure a smooth and hassle-free experience.

faqs.question: Can I customize the design and layout?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Choose from a variety of wall styles, finishes, accessories, and fixtures to create a shower that fits your taste, space, and budget. We offer complete customization for both design and function.

faqs.question: What materials are used for your showers?
faqs.answer: We use high-quality, durable, and low-maintenance materials that resist stains, mold, and mildew. Our wall systems and bases are engineered for longevity and easy cleaning.

faqs.question: Is demolition required for installation?
faqs.answer: No — our shower systems are designed to be installed directly over your existing surface, eliminating the need for messy demolition and lengthy renovation timelines.

faqs.question: Are your showers safe and accessible?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a range of accessibility options including low-threshold entries, grab bars, built-in seating, and non-slip surfaces to ensure comfort and safety for every user.

faqs.question: Do you offer warranties on your shower systems?
faqs.answer: Yes, all of our installations come with a workmanship warranty and material guarantees. We stand behind our quality and ensure your new shower performs beautifully for years.

faqs.question: How do I maintain my new shower?
faqs.answer: Our showers are designed for easy upkeep. Simply wipe surfaces with a non-abrasive cleaner to keep them fresh and spotless — no heavy scrubbing or harsh chemicals needed.

faqs.question: Do you provide free estimates or consultations?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer free design consultations and estimates. Our specialists will assess your space, review your options, and provide a transparent quote before any work begins.

faqs.question: Can you convert my bathtub into a shower?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in tub-to-shower conversions that maximize space, improve safety, and modernize your bathroom — all without major construction.

faq.sectionSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our bathtub remodeling services, including installation, customization, materials, and maintenance.

faqs.question: How long does a bathtub installation take?
faqs.answer: Most bathtub installations are completed in as little as one day, depending on the size and scope of work. Our process is efficient, minimizing disruption to your daily routine.

faqs.question: Do you remove my old bathtub?
faqs.answer: Yes, our team safely removes your existing bathtub as part of the installation process. We handle all preparation and cleanup to ensure a smooth, hassle-free experience.

faqs.question: Can I customize the design and features?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Choose from a variety of bathtub sizes, finishes, accessories, and therapeutic features to create a tub that fits your style, space, and needs.

faqs.question: What materials are used for your bathtubs?
faqs.answer: We use high-quality, durable materials such as premium acrylic and solid surfaces that are built to last, resist stains, and are easy to clean.

faqs.question: Is demolition required for installation?
faqs.answer: No — our bathtubs can often be installed over your existing surfaces, eliminating the need for messy demolition and extensive renovation timelines.

faqs.question: Are your bathtubs safe and accessible?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a range of accessibility options including walk-in designs, non-slip surfaces, and built-in seating to ensure safety and comfort for all users.

faqs.question: Do you offer warranties on your bathtubs?
faqs.answer: Yes, all of our installations come with workmanship warranties and material guarantees. We stand behind our quality to ensure your new bathtub performs beautifully for years.

faqs.question: How do I maintain my new bathtub?
faqs.answer: Our bathtubs are designed for easy maintenance. Simply wipe the surfaces with a non-abrasive cleaner to keep them looking pristine, with no heavy scrubbing required.

faqs.question: Do you provide free estimates or consultations?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer free in-home consultations and estimates. Our specialists assess your space, review your options, and provide a transparent quote before work begins.

faqs.question: Can you convert my shower into a bathtub?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in shower-to-bathtub conversions, creating a relaxing and stylish bathing space without major construction or disruption.

faq.sectionSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our kitchen renovation services, including design, installation, customization, and maintenance.

faqs.question: How long does a kitchen renovation take?
faqs.answer: Most kitchen renovations are completed within a few weeks, depending on the scope of work, design complexity, and material availability. Our process is organized to minimize disruption to your daily routine.

faqs.question: Do you remove my old cabinets and countertops?
faqs.answer: Yes, our team safely removes outdated cabinetry, countertops, and appliances as part of the renovation process, preparing your space for a seamless installation.

faqs.question: Can I customize the design and layout?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We offer fully customizable layouts, cabinet finishes, countertop materials, and features to create a kitchen that perfectly matches your style and needs.

faqs.question: What materials do you use for cabinets and countertops?
faqs.answer: We use premium, durable materials such as quartz, granite, solid wood, and high-quality cabinetry finishes that are designed to last and resist daily wear and tear.

faqs.question: Do you handle appliance installation?
faqs.answer: Yes, our team can install all kitchen appliances, including built-ins, smart appliances, and ventilation systems, ensuring they integrate seamlessly with your new kitchen design.

faqs.question: Is demolition required for installation?
faqs.answer: Some renovations require removal of existing elements, but we manage all demolition safely and efficiently to minimize mess and disruption.

faqs.question: Are your kitchens designed to be family-friendly?
faqs.answer: Yes, we prioritize ergonomic designs, durable surfaces, and safety-conscious layouts to create a functional kitchen for families of all sizes.

faqs.question: Do you offer warranties on your work?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide workmanship warranties and guarantees on materials used, so you can enjoy peace of mind with your new kitchen.

faqs.question: Can I get a free consultation or estimate?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer free consultations and estimates. Our specialists visit your home, discuss your vision, and provide a detailed plan and quote before starting the project.

faqs.question: Can you help with small updates instead of a full remodel?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We handle both full kitchen remodels and smaller upgrades, such as countertop replacements, cabinet refinishing, or layout optimizations.

hero.sectionTitle: Transform Your Basement Into a Beautiful Living Space
hero.sectionSubtitle: From unfinished storage to a stylish and comfortable retreat — our basement finishing solutions turn every corner of your home into a functional, livable space. Whether it’s a family room, home office, or entertainment area, we make it modern and inviting.

faq.sectionSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our basement renovation services, including design, installation, customization, and maintenance.

faqs.question: How long does a basement renovation take?
faqs.answer: Most basement renovations are completed within a few weeks, depending on the scope of work, design complexity, and material availability. Our process is organized to minimize disruption to your daily routine.

faqs.question: Can you finish an unfinished basement completely?
faqs.answer: Yes, we handle full basement finishing, including framing, insulation, electrical, plumbing, flooring, walls, and ceilings to create a complete living space.

faqs.question: Can I customize the basement layout and design?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We offer fully customizable layouts, finishes, lighting, and features to create a basement that perfectly matches your style and needs.

faqs.question: Do you install home entertainment systems or bars?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can incorporate media centers, bars, game rooms, and other entertainment features into your finished basement.

faqs.question: Are basements designed to be moisture-resistant?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use high-quality materials and finishes to ensure durability, moisture resistance, and long-lasting comfort.

faqs.question: Can a basement include a home office or gym?
faqs.answer: Yes, we design versatile spaces that can function as offices, gyms, hobby rooms, or additional living areas.

faqs.question: Do you provide warranties for basement renovations?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide workmanship warranties and guarantees on materials, so you can enjoy peace of mind with your newly finished basement.

faqs.question: Is a free consultation available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer free consultations and estimates. Our specialists visit your home, discuss your vision, and provide a detailed plan and quote before starting the project.

faqs.question: Can you help with partial basement finishing or smaller upgrades?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We handle both full basement finishing and smaller projects, such as flooring upgrades, lighting installations, or layout optimizations.
